com.easemob.chat

接口 EMContactListener


  • public interface EMContactListener
    contact change listener. if your app will use our contact management, you have to use this listener by implementing it to receive any change of contact

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onContactAdded(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernameList)
      增加联系人时回调此方法 this api will be called when there is any contact added
      void onContactAgreed(java.lang.String username)
      好友请求被同意 this api will be called when your application is accepted
      void onContactDeleted(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernameList)
      被删除时回调此方法 this api will be called when some contacts of yours are deleted
      void onContactInvited(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String reason)
      收到好友邀请 this api will be called when you receive a friend application
      void onContactRefused(java.lang.String username)
      好友请求被拒绝 this api will be called when your application is refused

    • 方法详细资料

      • onContactAdded

        void onContactAdded(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernameList)
        增加联系人时回调此方法 this api will be called when there is any contact added
        参数:
        usernameList - 增加的联系人list

      • onContactDeleted

        void onContactDeleted(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernameList)
        被删除时回调此方法 this api will be called when some contacts of yours are deleted
        参数:
        usernameList - 删除的联系人list

      • onContactInvited

        void onContactInvited(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String reason)
        收到好友邀请 this api will be called when you receive a friend application
        参数:
        username -
        reason -

      • onContactAgreed

        void onContactAgreed(java.lang.String username)
        好友请求被同意 this api will be called when your application is accepted
        参数:
        username -

      • onContactRefused

        void onContactRefused(java.lang.String username)
        好友请求被拒绝 this api will be called when your application is refused
        参数:
        username -
